column2: "Excuse me. Yes, you. Do you drink drinks? Why, of course you do! Why wouldn't you?"
"Drinks are pretty useful, eh? It upgrades abilities if drunk before setting out. Pretty darn useful."
"My latest creation is Shifta drink! Wouldn't you just love to have an even wider selection of drinks to choose from? Of course you would! "
"It's settled then! You simply must help me. The ingredients I want you to fetch are listed right on the job request!"
"Well, I'm counting on you! With the right ingredients, I could whip up a batch in no time!"
